SELECT rd.ID, rd.RegionID as regionId, rr.Name as regionName, r.Name as plateName, rd.Name as residenceName, rd.Address FROM residence AS rd JOIN region AS r ON rd.RegionID = r.RegionID JOIN region AS rr ON r.ParentID = rr.RegionID WHERE rd.`status` = 1
rd.RegionID = #id#
